# Tailwind Animations - LLM Context File

## Project Overview
**tailwind-animations** es un plugin de Tailwind CSS que proporciona un conjunto completo de animaciones CSS listas para usar a través de clases de utilidad. El proyecto fue creado por Miguel Ángel Durán (@midudev) y su comunidad.

**Repository**: https://github.com/midudev/tailwind-animations
**License**: MIT
**Version**: 1.0.1

## Key Information

### Installation
El paquete se instala vía npm, pnpm o yarn:
```
npm install tailwind-animations
pnpm install tailwind-animations
yarn add tailwind-animations
```

### Usage
Se implementa como plugin de Tailwind CSS v4:
```css
/* globals.css */
@import "tailwindcss";
@plugin 'tailwind-animations';
```

### Core Features
- **70+ Animaciones predefinidas**: fade-in, slide, zoom, rotate, flip, bounce, pulse, etc.
- **Utility Classes para control granular**: animate-delay-*, animate-duration-*, animate-iteration-count-*
- **Animation Timing Functions**: ease, ease-in, ease-out, ease-in-out, linear
- **Cubic Bezier Curves**: Múltiples curvas de easing predefinidas (sine, quad, cubic, quart, quint, expo, circ, back)
- **Animation Fill Modes**: forwards, backwards, both
- **Animation Direction**: normal, reverse, alternate, alternate-reverse
- **Animation Play State**: running, paused
- **View Timeline Support**: Animaciones basadas en la posición del elemento en la ventana
- **Scroll Timeline Support**: Animaciones sincronizadas con scroll

### Animation Categories

#### Fade Animations
- blurred-fade-in, fade-in, fade-out
- fade-in-up, fade-in-down, fade-in-left, fade-in-right
- fade-out-up, fade-out-down, fade-out-left, fade-out-right
- pulse-fade-in

#### Slide Animations
- slide-in-top, slide-in-bottom, slide-in-left, slide-in-right
- slide-out-top, slide-out-bottom, slide-out-left, slide-out-right
- slide-up-fade, slide-rotate-in, slide-rotate-out

#### Zoom & Scale Animations
- zoom-in, zoom-out, scale, pop
- expand-horizontally, contract-horizontally
- expand-vertically, contract-vertically

#### Rotation Animations
- rotate-90, rotate-180, rotate-360
- spin-clockwise, spin-counter-clockwise
- rotate-in, rotate-out
- impulse-rotation-right, impulse-rotation-left

#### Flip Animations
- flip-horizontal, flip-vertical
- flip-x, flip-y
- flip-in-x, flip-in-y
- flip-out-x, flip-out-y

#### Movement & Motion Animations
- bouncing, bounce-fade-in, vertical-bounce, horizontal-bounce
- swing, sway, wobble, jiggle, tilt, squeeze
- jump, hang, roll-in, roll-out
- float, sink, shake, blink

#### Interactive Animations
- tada, heartbeat, pulse, pulsing
- rubber-band, flash
- horizontal-vibration, rotational-wave
- dancing, jelly

#### Composite Animations
- swing-drop-in
- skew, skew-right

### Theme Configuration Variables

#### Animation Delays
- 0ms, 100ms, 150ms, 200ms, 250ms, 300ms, 400ms, 500ms, 700ms, 800ms, 900ms, 1000ms

#### Animation Durations
- **Named**: slower (500ms), slow (400ms), normal (300ms), fast (200ms), faster (100ms)
- **Numeric**: 0ms, 100ms, 150ms, 200ms, 250ms, 300ms, 400ms, 500ms, 700ms, 800ms, 900ms, 1000ms

#### Animation Iteration Counts
- once (1), twice (2), thrice (3), infinite

#### Animation Fill Modes
- forwards, backwards, both

#### Animation Steps
- retro (8 steps), normal (16 steps), modern (24 steps)

#### Animation Ranges
- cover, contain, entry, exit
- gradual (10% 90%), moderate (20% 80%), brisk (30% 70%), rapid (40% 60%)

### Technical Details

**Stack**:
- Tailwind CSS v4.1.18
- Astro 4.3.3
- PostCSS 8.5.6
- ESLint 9.39.2
- Vitest 4.0.16

**Project Structure**:
```
tailwind-animations/
├── src/
│   └── index.css (Todas las animaciones y utilidades)
├── lib/ (Imágenes y assets)
├── packages/ (Paquete scoped para compatibilidad)
├── test/ (Suite de pruebas)
├── web/ (Sitio web de demostración)
├── scripts/ (Scripts de utilidad y publicación)
├── package.json
├── pnpm-workspace.yaml
└── eslint.config.js
```

**Commands**:
- `npm run lint` - ESLint check
- `npm run lint:fix` - ESLint fix
- `npm run test` - Vitest
- `npm run test:ci` - Vitest CI mode
- `npm run publish:official` - Publish main package
- `npm run publish:scoped` - Publish scoped package
- `npm run publish:both` - Publish both packages

### Dependencies
- **Peer Dependencies**: tailwindcss ^4.0.0
- **Dev Dependencies**: tailwindcss, postcss, vitest, eslint, prettier, y herramientas de linting

### Notes
- El paquete original `@midudev/tailwind-animations` está deprecado. Se recomienda usar `tailwind-animations`
- Para Tailwind CSS v3, usar la última versión compatible: `@midudev/tailwind-animations@0.2.0`
- El plugin es CSS-only, sin dependencias de JavaScript
